mapper.select: select i.id, u.path as loginAct, i.noteContent, i.createTime, i.createBy, i.editTime, i.editBy, i.ideaId from tbl_idea_remark i join tbl_user u on u.loginAct = i.loginAct where i.ideaId=#{ideaId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_idea_remark ( id, loginAct, noteContent, createTime, createBy, ideaId ) values ( #{id}, #{loginAct}, #{noteContent}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{ideaId} )
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_idea_remark where id=#{id} and loginAct=#{loginAct}
